pageContext.claim: “I'm going back to Washington. I'm going back. I'll be violating the carbon footprint. I'm going to Hawaii to play golf. I drive to play a round of golf and the course I own doesn't even cost them anything. He flies to Hawaii, nobody cares. If I drive 20 minutes, it's like Donald Trump is playing golf today.”
pageContext.analysis: Barack Obama flew to Hawaii to go on vacation; he would not fly there just to play a round of golf. When in Washington, Obama would play golf nearby. As for Trump's golfing not costing anything, The Washington Post [reported the Secret Service has disclosed that it has spent $588,000 on golf carts alone since 2017 to protect and escort Trump during his outings.The Secret Service spent at least $250,000 at President Trump’s properties in just the first five months of his term, according to records of federal charge card expenditures released last year to a watchdog group, Property of the People.
